data.title: Jasjit Kang on LinkedIn: Spirit of Wipro is about bringing everyone together - communities, clients…
data.meta_description: Spirit of Wipro is about bringing everyone together - communities, clients and colleagues. It is about going beyond business objectives, to make a difference… | 37 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
🦸 The 2024 #SSOW G6 BPO Debate has taken centre stage, flipping the script to hear from industry partners (and superheroes) first-hand! 🔄 Prominent BPO C-Level execs faced rigorous questioning, sharing insights on market shifts, future-proofing strategies, and the evolving landscape of BPO-GBS collaboration. Big shoutout to Deborah Kops for keeping even the bigwigs on their toes! This year, our discussions were nothing short of heroic, taking on some major questions: 1️⃣ What do you see as the one major challenge in the GBS/shared services industry today? 🚧 2️⃣ What do you offer that your clients can’t? 💪 3️⃣ Is Gen AI a game changer for GBS, or another dodo bird? 🤖 4️⃣ Where are the Wonder Women in GBS? 🦸♀️ 5️⃣ What are GBS leaders currently doing wrong? ❌ 6️⃣ What is the future of GBS? 🔮 Some of our favourite takeaways from this super-powered debate: 🔊 "Let's better communicate industry advancements to the younger generation." - Eloi Decottignies 💼 "GBS must embrace the next business model shift with determination." - Anjali Pendlebury -Green 🤖 "Gen AI's impact: gradual evolution, not sudden extinction or revolution." - Jasjit Kang 🏃♂️ "Gen AI: a marathon, not a sprint." - Ashok Pai ❓ "We must ask why we're employing AI." - Satish Nair 💪 "Grit, resilience, and hybrid working can elevate women's representation in leadership." - Anjali Pendlebury -Green 🚀 "We're in an era of optimisation, but transformation beckons." - Jasjit Kang Next up on the SSOW Big Idea stage tomorrow morning is F1 Legend Mika Hakkinen! Stay tuned! 🏎 #G6BPODebate #SharedServices #BPO #Innovation #SSOW #GBS

"Empathy is the tender touch that sews the delicate fabric of humanity 🔥, weaving hearts💞 and minds into a tapestry of unity and understanding ." To practice empathy and humanity, follow these too vital steps:🙂 .1️⃣ Listen deeply a: Give your undivided attention to the speaker, Hear not only their words but also the unspoken feelings that lie beneath. . 2️⃣Put yourself in their shoes Cultivate the ability to see the world from another's perspectiveS, imagining their experiences thought , and emotions, . #kindness #empathy #humanity #creativity #futurism #love
